content.description: This problem is located on the Continuum Transfunctioner Boulder on its SE side/corner.  Begin on the corner/arete just right of an alcove/small cave.  It is overhanging and really loose.  The problem spit me off every time and still awaits a first ascent.
content.protection: Spotter, to keep you from falling into cactus.
content.location: SE corner of Continuum Transfunctioner Boulder.

climbs.name: We're Not Guys, We're Hot Chicks.

content.description: This problem is on the west side of the Shibby Boulder (highest of the three) away from the hotel.  Sit or stand start and climb a few feet west of the left side arete.
content.protection: Spotter, pad.  Be careful, the rock is sandstone and friable in some places.

content.description: Start by stemming a dihedral feature on the SE side of the Shibby Boulder.  Continue up on small holds and gritty feet overhanging slightly.
content.protection: Spotter for keeping ya outta the cactus.
content.location:
SE side of the Shibby Boulder.  Just to the right of "

And Theeeeeeeen?

"

content.description: Start on thin fingers and move up and right towards the top.  Smear your feet on the grippy sandstone.  A decent problem.
content.location:
Right side of the arete for

Where's Your Car Dude?

on the Continuum Transfunctioner Boulder.

content.description: Begin on small crimps and holds to the top.  Watch the holds as they pop.
content.location: East side of Shibby Boulder, middle.

content.description: Short but sweet.  Sit start on the south side of Continuum Transfunctioner Boulder.
content.location:
South side of Continuum Transfunctioner Boulder, just left of

Where's Your Car Dude?

.

content.description: This problem is on the east side facing the hotel of the Zoltan Boulder.  This is the largest of the three and is overhanging on the right (north) side.  Christi Boner climbs the face to the highest point.  The problem is a bit gritty  but I found the holds rather solid.  It's a bit overhanging too.
content.protection: Maybe sunglasses.  Since the route slightly overhangs, when you look up to grab a hold, you may knock sand into your eyes.
content.location: East side of Zoltan Boulder.  Downclimb/walk off to the west, obvious.

content.description:
Just left of

We're Not Guys, We're Hot Chicks

, climb the arete on good solid holds up and to the right while liebacking or stemming onto the face to your right.
content.protection: Spotter and a pad, but not really necessary.  Just watch out for cactus!

content.description:
Sit start just left of

Sweet, What's Mine Say?

and follow tiny holds on overhanging rock to the top.  This is probably the most solid stone on the three boulders, and it's stained orange/rust in color.
content.location: South side of Shibby Boulder.  Look for the large orange/rust stained color.
